techmeme.title: DeepSeek's rise has the turned the spotlight on its hometown, Hangzhou, the capital of the Zhejiang province, which has earmarked ~$13.7B to fund tech companies (Lauren Faith Lau/Bloomberg)
Fal.ai, a Turkish startup specializing in AI-generated media for enterprise use, raised a $49M Series B led by Notable Capital, taking its total funding to $72M (Lucy Adams/Tech.eu)
Sources: Anthropic expects to burn $3B in 2025, down from $5.6B in 2024, and make up to $3.7B in revenue in 2025, as it seeks to catch up with OpenAI (The Information)
Harvey, which builds generative AI tools for law firms, raised a $300M Series D led by Sequoia at a $3B valuation; CEO Winston Weinberg says ARR surpassed $50M (Sharon Goldman/Fortune)
Memo: CISA halts election security work and reviews related activities conducted since 2017, to comply with Trump's January 20 EO on "ending federal censorship" (Eric Geller/Wired)
